node.excerpt: To kick start my updated site (I need a first post or else the gatsby build will throw a ton of errors lol) and the beginning of my blogging era (who knows how long this will last), I’ve decided to post my final paper for AFVS 70: The Art of Film. This was the first course I’ve taken at Harvard where I’ve truly felt out of my comfort zone but I am truly grateful to have take it. I’ve learned so much about film history, film analysis, and the art of storytelling. While I am by no means a film ex…
